text: <@U4V22C6A1> has joined the channel
_@chloe.deneuve has joined the channel_
<mailto:_@sahra.al|_@sahra.al> has joined the channel_

Hey Sahra, please meet Chloe your incredible E-Mentor I've been telling you about :smile:.  Feel free to introduce yourselves, say a little bit about what you would like to get out of the mentorship and continue chatting within this channel. :wave:

I will now be leaving the channel, but please direct message myself or emma-prospela if you have any questions. All the best for now! :slightly_smiling_face:
_@dexter has left the channel_
_@dexter has left the channel_

Hi Chloe! I hope you’re well! I’m very excited to have you as my E-mentor :laughing: I’m Sahra, currently finished my first year of animation. I love animating and drawing original characters. One day I hope to become an animator working on TV series :D It’s nice to meet you!
Hello Sahra, I am very well thank. How are you? Where is that you're studying Animation? I currently work as a Senior Character Animator at Blue Zoo Animtation. Do you know it?

Im good thanks! That’s fantastic! One day I hope to become a senior animator like yourself :’) I’m studying at Buckinghamshire New University on a part-time, distance learning course. Yes, I found out about Blue Zoo through AnimDojo and ever since I’ve been researching as much as I can about the studio :’) I’d love to be apart of the team some day!
I actually applied for the 3D Animation internship at Blue Zoo but did not get it unfortunately. Oh well! I’ll definitely apply again next year! :muscle::muscle::sparkles:

Oh wow and how is Uni going? Are you a part of AnimDojo? I did a few streams on there myself. That's a shame you didn't get the internship, I admire that you're not giving up though. That shows a lot of strenght already.
So what would you like to get from this, how can I help?
:slightly_smiling_face:

Ohh I think I’ve seen you on there in an interview with Bader!! :D that’s awesome!! I actually took away a few things from that interview! I wasn’t able to get far with AnimDojo as I’ve been busy with work and uni, but I’m hoping to make use of the resources over the summer :’) 

From this mentoring session I hope to get some advice on polishing my demo reel and internship/job application tips. I would also just like to talk through what the job is like for you day to day. Having gone from a junior position to a more senior position it would be great to know about the things you think have helped you progress :) Animation tips and tricks would also be super helpful too!! There are just so many things to talk about :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
